name: Relais Rome Sweet Relais Fori Imperiali

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent one night in Relais Rome Sweet Home Fori imperiali. Loved it. We'd stayed in Hotel Madison by Termini station the night before (with friends who'd already booked it) and this was a very welcome uprgade (at the same price)
reviews.title: Excellent quirky stay

reviews.text: As another poster said, room was exactly like the pictures. Very clean and modern. Its at the end of a back street right off the Roman Forum. You enter in a traditional style old door and go up 3 floors of concrete steps and white washed walls of a quaint old Roman building. Once you enter the Relais its jumped forward in time - very very clean, sleek and modern. There are only 4 rooms and a small check in desk. The guy who runs it is so friendly and helpful. He offered us a bottle of wine as we had got married in July. While we strictly were not on honeymoon - but still in honeymoon phase I felt this very generous.
reviews.title: Perfect accomodation - will stay there again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We slept soundly, not a pick of noise, great air con, cumfy pillows and blinds and curtains (not often found in Rome). Breakfast was really lovely - we had a Lavaza coffee maker in the room and my husband went to the communal landing where a try with our room number sat with some juice, toast and croissants. Not a huge spread and not the best breakfast, but it was completly sufficient and lovely to eat in our room with the window open to the city.
reviews.title: THE ROOM ACTUALLY REFLECTS THE WEBSITE'S PICTURES

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this - if I were back again I would try the Spanish steps as I think its a better area for night time - but the food in the Fori Imperiali are is great and only 15mins walk to Trevi Fountain!
reviews.title: A wonderful spacious apartment run by super people in the heart of the city.

aka: Relais Rome Sweet Relais Fori Imperiali Hotel Rome
description: Experience the modern flair, the cosy atmosphere and the independent accommodation of Relais Fori Imperiali, just 20 metres from the Imperial Forums and near the Colosseum.Set on the first floor of a 17th-century palace, Relais Fori Imperiali combines a historic setting with contemporary luxuries. You will be in a famous, residential area with little noise arriving from the very busy streets of Rome.
